member.name: T:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.Stock
member.summary: Represents a stock with a symbol and price.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.Stock.Symbol
member.summary: Gets and sets the stock symbol. Converts to upper case when setting.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.Stock.Price
member.summary: Gets and sets the stock price. Rounds to 2 decimal digits when setting.

member.name: T:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockCombinationsGenerator
member.summary: Represents a stock quantity combinations generator.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockCombinationsGenerator.NumberOfPossibleCombinations
member.summary: Gets the number of possible stock quantity combinations.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockCombinationsGenerator.HasCombinations
member.summary: Returns true if there are any stock quantity combinations.

member.name: M:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockCombinationsGenerator.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Decimal)
member.summary: Creates the stock quantity combinations generator.

member.name: T:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockPricesGetter
member.summary: Represents an API stock price getter for getting the prices of one or more stocks.

member.name: M:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockPricesGetter.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates the stock prices getter from the given symbol(s).

member.name: M:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockPricesGetter.UpdatePrices
member.summary: Updates the prices of all the stocks using the online public API.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockPricesGetter.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the price of the specified stock ticker symbol.

member.name: P:YonatanMankovich.StockBuyingHelper.StockQuantity.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets a stock quantity.
